section.name: Java Access to MythTV
section.p: libmythtv-java is an API to access the MythTV ecosystem. It provides low-level communication protocol implementations that are easily extensible as MythTV development continues. It also provides higher-level APIs for simpler access to the logical functions of MythTV.
MythTV is an open source DVR system that provides a distributed client/server model for recording and watching TV as well as a full media environment for movies, music, and games.

p.b: Please note that this project and its author are not in any way affiliated with the MythTV project and are in no way endorsed by that project or its authors.
